rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs, potent metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment discusses duration/process ('can take four to six months'), not a moderate verb paired with scale/impact.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports manufacturing time but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a capability/process ('can take four to six months') without active reassurance.
